numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between age groups.
2. People who are 15 years old and at most 24 years old believe significantly more than people who are at least 40 years old that the world is getting better.
3. I noticed a difference between countries.
4. Indonesia is by far the most optimistic country.
5. I ask why the age groups have such different opinions.
6. I ask why people in Indonesia are so optimistic.
8. I have not noticed any people who say that the world is getting worse every generation.
9. The headline is: Is the world getting worse?
